alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 21 at 3:50PM EST until November 22 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches with the highest amounts in the southern Greens in Vermont. Ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch are expected. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County. In southern Vermont, Bennington and Western Windham Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will move in later this evening and mix with sleet and freezing rain prior to midnight. The snow, sleet and freezing rain will change to plain rain during the late night hours and diminish prior to noontime.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
